handoff_data.summary: Completed comprehensive destination analysis for Thailand. Includes summer market & destination, emotional and trend insights. Focus on summer pricing, youth activity and visual triggers for Kupibilet campaign.
handoff_data.context_for_next: Use the destination, market and emotional analysis with actionable insights to drive creative content. Emphasise independent travel, summer fun, social media imagery and Kupibilet strengths.
recommendations: Использовать визуальные и эмоциональные триггеры летнего Таиланда
Комбинировать инфоповоды про экскурсии, рынки, ночную жизнь
Акцентировать пользу и простоту сервиса Kupibilet
